text: The Texas House of Representatives is the lower house of the Texas Legislature. It has 150 members, who each one district of Texas. They serve for a two-year term with no term limits. The house meets at the Texas State Capitol in Austin, Texas. ==Leadership== Position Name Party Residence District Speaker of the House Dustin Burrows Republican Lubbock 83 Speaker Pro Tempore Joe Moody Democratic El Paso 78 Republican Caucus Chair Tom Oliverson Republican Cypress 130 Democratic Caucus Chair Gene Wu Democratic Houston 137 ==Composition== Affiliation Party (Shading indicates
